casebody.data:
IN RE: A.P. 145P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2017 Anne C. Wright, Attorney at Law, Boone, for Powell, Kylah. Christopher C. Peace, Attorney at Law, Keith T. Roberson, Attorney at Law, for Mecklenburg County DSS. Matthew D. Wunsche, GAL Appellate Counsel, for GAL.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of May 2017 by Petitioner for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2017."
